entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
